docs.snippet: The Royal Mail steamship America, from Liverpool on the 29th of January, with one week's later advices from Europe, arrived at Halifax at 10 1/2 o'clock last night. She has been delayed by a succession of strong westerly gales during the enti e...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship America, from Liverpool on the 29th of January, with one week's later advices from Europe, arrived at Halifax at 10 1/2 o'clock last night. She has been delayed by a succession of strong westerly gales during the enti e passage.
